DOC.brief_summary: The purpose current study determine whether intensive lifestyle intervention effective surgery treat morbid obesity nine year post-intervention .
DOC.detailed_description: Behavioral/lifestyle intervention produce acceptable success treat moderately obese subject . However , effectiveness weight loss maintenance morbidly obese subject remain elusive . Twenty-nine morbidly obese female participate non-randomized study . Fifteen subject assign lifestyle group 14 underwent vertical band gastroplasty . Subjects lifestyle group attend 30 behavioral modification session three year , whereas surgery group receive standard care nutrition . Body weight , rest metabolic rate , physical activity , body composition measurement dietary intake data assess standard time point first 3 year post-intervention . Follow-up data body weight physical activity also collect 9 year later .
DOC.criteria: female sex Age ≥ 18 year BMI ≥ 40 kg/m2 Absence mental illness determine evaluation experience psychiatrist Additional inclusion criterion vertical band gastroplasty history multiple , nonsuccessful , previous attempt weight loss
